about_the_game:
You will embody a female elf on the brink of extinction, venturing into a dark fantasy world filled with danger and evil. In this perilous environment teeming with goblins, orcs, and cultists, you must strive to survive. You can choose to battle your enemies or immerse yourself in the dark forces... It all depends on your choices!

Game Features:

  • A rich quest system that immerses you in the darkest worldview!

  • Various factions gather in the game, including the cursed, goblins, cultists, beasts, orcs, tentacle monsters... danger lurks around every corner!

  • A wide variety of items and resources: food, cooking, alchemy, lumberjacking, weapon crafting, and even erotic items like aphrodisiacs!

  • Puzzle systems that test your wits: dungeons, special challenges, stat development... waiting for you to explore!

The game is still under development. Please join our Discord server for more information.

content_descriptors.notes:
Sexual assault/non-consensual sex content included.
All characters are above the age of 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1030(2GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
